name: X-IT-50: The Quest for the Meaning of Life
overview: Since man was first able to reason he has pondered the question of, "what is the meaning of life?... Until now the answer has always been elusive. Using your skill and dexterity, find your way through the 50 levels and exit and all will be revealed. The base launcher is controlled by the mouse. Ammo is fired by the base launcher. Atom is fatal if touched by base. Arrow disks can be used to move your pod in the indicated directions. Ammo disks will add 5 shells to your ammo until it reaches 39 max. Time disk adds 20 seconds to limit. Guide the pod around the levels and collect keys. Shoot to move tiles in that direction. When all the keys have been collected the exit will be revealed. Game comes with level editor... in case you would like to edit that last level and take a look.
